name: HasAnchoring
desc: An interface that enables anchoring of virtual content to a real-world object in an AR scene.

items.name: var anchoring: AnchoringComponent
items.desc: The component that describes how the virtual content is anchored to the real world.

items.name: struct AnchoringComponent
items.desc: A description of how virtual content can be anchored to the real world.

items.name: var anchorIdentifier: UUID?
items.desc: The identifier of the AR anchor to which the entity is anchored, or nil if it isn’t currently anchored.

items.name: func reanchor(AnchoringComponent.Target, preservingWorldTransform: Bool)
items.desc: Changes the entity’s anchoring, preserving either the world transform or the local transform.
